title: WWF lungs typo
content:
Hi..

I need to find out which font this is.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ddd.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724201632/http:/typophile.com/files/ddd_0.png) | 31.1 KB |
author: damm1990

comments.content:
The resolution of your sample is low, but it looks like **[Gunplay](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724201632/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Gunplay%20-%20Regular&fid=692364a9599a246f0d083f865096ab52&fsize=60&text=Before%20its%20too%20late%20wwf.org&wrap=2)** stencil font by Ray Larabie  
The regular weight is free to use and if you make it a bit bolder the stencil gaps will disappear.
